info: French allows three main patterns: rising intonation, using est-ce que before a statement, or inverting the subject and verb (Parles-tu...?). Inversion is most common in writing and formal situations. Common question words are qui, que/quoi, quand, où, pourquoi, and comment.
native_answer: who is she? the teacher
answer: qui est-elle ? la professeure
audio_dir: qui est-elle ? la professeure

info: French allows three main patterns: rising intonation, using est-ce que before a statement, or inverting the subject and verb (Parles-tu...?). Inversion is most common in writing and formal situations. Common question words are qui, que/quoi, quand, où, pourquoi, and comment.
native_answer: who are they? friends
answer: qui sont-ils ? amis
audio_dir: qui sont-ils ? amis
